X.ii.6.B.5.a
.
Protection of Disability Ratings Under 38 U.S.C. 110
Disability ratings are provided some protection from reduction under
38 U.S.C. 110
.  This protection does
not
apply to a rating of permanent incapacity for self-support.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B - A Child’s Permanent Incapacity for Self-Support
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section B
